name: TweetTweetJam2 jumper
description:
Jump on those inexplicable floating platforms! Use arrows to move, but don't touch the top or bottom!

If you score 200 points you get a save, which will bounce you off the bottom of the screen. You still have to worry about the top though!

When you lose, just use the enter menu to restart.

(be careful about going near the top of the screen, it causes a bug i wasn't able to figure out)
